name: Juventus VR - CR7 at Villar Perosa
detailed_description: You aren’t officially a Juventus player until you have featured in a match at Villar Perosa. For Cristiano, thousands of fans streamed in to the picturesque ground to see the Bianconeri’s new signing in action, and of course, score his first goal in his new jersey. Experience the match against Villar Perosa in this video.
